title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: The display property of an item is set to 'none', but it doesn't take effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is still being displayed in the PDF output.
EB: The display property should correctly hide the item when set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label. 2. Open the 'properties' view. 3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
